context.flawed_solution:
#### 90
Ryan caught 60 / 2 = <<60/2=30>>30 fish.
Jason caught 30 / 3 = <<30/3=10>>10 fish.
So, all of them caught a total of 30 + 60 = <<30+60=90>>90 fish.
